Text: I loved this movie as a kid. Thanks for the upload. :)

A gem of a film, ending SF may creak a bit after 45 years but the story and performances are lovely. Great for adults and kids. Tony Randal an almost forgotten actor of considerable talent. The upload will renew interest, I have it  on DVD, you can still get it.
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0057812/ gotta watch this, i just saw The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus second time :)
